member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.Name
member.summary: Unique name of the feature.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.Parent
member.summary: Parent of this feature, if one exists. If set, this feature can be enabled only if the parent is enabled.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.Children
member.summary: List of child features.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.DefaultValue
member.summary: Default value of the feature.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.IsVisibleToClients
member.summary: Can clients see this feature and it's value. Default: true.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.IsAvailableToHost
member.summary: Can host use this feature. Default: true.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.AllowedProviders
member.summary: A list of allowed providers to get/set value of this feature. An empty list indicates that all providers are allowed.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets/sets a key-value on the .
member.returns: Returns the value in the dictionary by given . Returns null if given is not present in the dictionary.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.Properties
member.summary: Can be used to get/set custom properties for this feature.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.ValueType
member.summary: Input type. This can be used to prepare an input for changing this feature's value. Default: .

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.WithProperty(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a property in the dictionary. This is a shortcut for nested calls on this object.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Features.FeatureDefinition.WithProviders(System.String[])
member.summary: Sets a property in the dictionary. This is a shortcut for nested calls on this object.

member.summary: Adds a child feature.

member.name: T:Volo.Abp.Features.RequiresFeatureAttribute
member.summary: This attribute can be used on a class/method to declare that given class/method is available only if required feature(s) are enabled.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.RequiresFeatureAttribute.Features
member.summary: A list of features to be checked if they are enabled.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Features.RequiresFeatureAttribute.RequiresAll
member.summary: If this property is set to true, all of the must be enabled. If it's false, at least one of the must be enabled. Default: false.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.Features.RequiresFeatureAttribute.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates a new instance of class.
member.param: A list of features to be checked if they are enabled
